name: Lauri Malmi
content: Lauri Malmi Lauri Malmi Professor Aalto University, School of Science Department of Computer Science Teaching CS-C2120 Programming studio 2: Project Research Research interests: Computing education research, especially program and algorithm visualization and automatic assessment in introductory programming, educational technology LeTech - Learning + Technology Group My publications at my Google scholar site. Memberships: ACM, ACM SIGCSE, SEFI, INSTICC Office hours No office hours currently due to COVID-19 restrictions. Please, contact me by email. Personal Ristin killan oltermanni, v. 2001 - 2007. Hobbies: playing classical piano music, bridge, literature Aalto University, School of Science Department of Computer Science Building T, Room A139 Konemiehentie 2 P.O.Box 15400 00076 Aalto, Finland Tel.int: +358 50 577 2176 Telefax: +358 9 470 23293 Lauri.Malmi_REMOVE_THIS_ @ aalto.fi
